title: Jagan Mohan Reddy Exclusive | After Andhra Violence, Jagan Reddy Points Finger At Chandrababu Naidu
description:
Jaganmohan Reddy, the former Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh, has accused his successor Chandrababu Naidu of being responsible for the continuing political violence in the state. 

#JaganmohanReddy #ChandrababuNaidu #AndhraPradesh #TDP
